title: The Ark in Philistine Territory
summary: 1 Samuel 5 describes how the Ark brings judgment to the Philistines. In Ashdod, their god Dagon falls before the Ark. Plagues strike the people, and panic spreads as the Ark is moved from city to city.

faq.question: What happened to the idol Dagon before the Ark?
faq.answer: It fell face down before the Ark and was later broken into pieces.

faq.question: How did God judge the Philistines?
faq.answer: He afflicted them with tumors and panic wherever the Ark was taken.
